lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator

Class CardSlotSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator.AbstractHardware<CardSlotListener>
      • lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator.CardSlotSimulator

  • public class CardSlotSimulator
extends AbstractHardware<CardSlotListener>
    Represents a device that accepts and reads magnetic stripe cards (credit cards, debit cards, etc.).

    • Field Summary

      • CardSlotSimulator

    • Method Detail

      • ejectCard

        public void ejectCard()
               throws EmptyException,
                      DisabledException
        Ejects the card from the card slot. If successful, announces a "cardEjected" event to its listeners.
        Throws:
        EmptyException - if the card slot does not contain a card.
        DisabledException - if the card slot is currently disabled.

      • insertCard

        public void insertCard(Card cs)
                throws CardSlotNotEmptyException,
                       DisabledException
        Inserts a card into the card slot. If successful, announces a "cardInserted" event to its listeners.
        Throws:
        CardSlotNotEmptyException - if the card slot already contains a card.
        DisabledException - if the card slot is currently disabled.

      • loadWithoutEvents

        public void loadWithoutEvents(Card card)
        Allows a card to be loaded into the slot without causing events to be announced.
        Parameters:
        card -

      • readCardData

        public Card readCardData()
                  throws EmptyException
        Reads the data stored on the card that is currently inserted. Causes no events to be announced.
        Throws:
        EmptyException - if there is no card currently in the card slot.
